name: Quilted Armor
description: A homespun gambeson. A sure sign of a hooligan.

name: Gambeson
description: A proper gambeson, befitting a squire.

name: Leather Armor
description: Composed of boiled leather. Worn by knaves.

name: Brigandine
description: Metal plates riveted together beneath leather. Cheaper than mail.

name: Breastplate
description: Robust protection for the vital regions.

name: Hauberk
description: A chainmail shirt, as worn by rank-and-file infantry.

name: Ringmail
description: Chainmail, almost, but the links are not woven together.

name: Half Plate Armor
description: Plate armor, but with nonessentials stripped away to spare the cost.

name: Splinted Chainmail
description: Chainmail with vertical splints to shore up defense of the limbs.
